name: Space Chase (StarWolf128)
description:
"It is the distant future and intergalactic space travel is now commonplace.  You are an officer of the Terrican Empire's Astro Patrol Force.  Your job is to inspect civilian ships passing through your sector of space for any contraband."

Space Chase is the first video game I ever created, made with Chris Maltby's GB Studio. It is the first entry of the Astro Chronicles universe, which I'm hoping becomes a whole little series for me. 

In Space Chase, the player is an intergalactic custom officer in charge of inspecting every ship passing through their assigned sector of space. Any ship that's holding wanted criminals, illegal goods, or is breaking some other vague Terrican law must be arrested in order for the player to progress to the next level. There are seven levels in all (roughly about ten minutes of total length).
